Articles.Content:
23 hours ago, Spaceman20290 said:

You need to download the mod off of Space Dock for now, I had the same issue you did. For some reason CKAN will not install the mod right.

23 hours ago, Insanity_BK said:

CKAN never does

When you're aware of a problem with how CKAN installs a mod, please report it on the CKAN thread or in an issue so we can fix it, rather than bothering mod authors.

  • https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/NetKAN/issues/new/choose

The missing folder should be included in installs in a few minutes.

Could someone make a RO config for this? I'd love to use this in my RO save!

Great mod by the way!
Will it work fine with 1.8? Has anyone tested this?

17 hours ago, NewRetroMan said:

Will it work fine with 1.8? Has anyone tested this?

I've got it on 1.8.1 with Kopernicus. It works wonderfully. 

Also, just wanted to ask; Will the original Dragon be added? It'd be a great addition.

Edited May 23, 2020 by alberro+
I think I might have a problem with the instalation but I cant load any stock crafts exept for the falcon demo.

Update v6.1 has been released!

Changelog

Spoiler

Version 6.1 | May 26 2020

* Added logos to F9 stage 2 for DM2 mission
* Added extendable docking port and improved the model
* Added docking node size to Crew Dragon docking port description
* Added Abort action group to rescaled F9- and FH Crew Dragon Stack
* Improved F9 Worm texture
* Fixed potential bug on Falcon 9 Block 5 second stage fuel tank
* Added troubleshooting section to the readme file

Download from Spacedock

i'm watching demo-2 rn and i'm about to install this

Edited May 27, 2020 by Kraken that doesn't exist

1 hour ago, Kraken that doesn't exist said:

i'm watching demo-2 rn and i'm about to install this

Quite a shame that it was scrubbed for today though.

Just now, alberro+ said:

Quite a shame that it was scrubbed for today though.

yeah

if it launched it would be going over my head rn
Hi my trunk triggers immediately when starting and the FH decouplers for the boosters trip but the boosters are still attached.

@msp307 Hm that's weird. Do you have Animated Decouplers installed (link in OP) or playing without it?

You could try downloading that and seeing if that fixes it until I have the time to take a look at it.

8 minutes ago, Kartoffelkuchen said:

@msp307 Hm that's weird. Do you have Animated Decouplers installed (link in OP) or playing without it?

You could try downloading that and seeing if that fixes it until I have the time to take a look at it.

  
yes i installed. the decouplers for the boosters had worked before my update.

On 5/17/2020 at 5:59 AM, Get Rice said:

Hey all,

I can't seem to install the mod properly. I followed the readme instructions perfectly and all that's available is the F9 Demo parts. Everything else is hidden or doesn't exist. I installed the mod off of https://spacedock.info/mod/269/SpaceX Launch Vehicles?ga=+3102+'kerbal+space+program'> and I am on version 1.9.1. while running KSP through Steam. I don't understand why I am the only one affected. Can someone offer me assistance?

Thanks,

Alex

Do you have any other mods installed?

@Kartoffelkuchen,

Your Dragon V2 model looks great. Would you allow me to use it for Realism Overhaul Capsules?

hi I was wondering when I use Mechjeb 2 with theses it gets wonky at the end of a burn when the time gets below 1 sec of burn time the ship just goes around trying to follow the bue marker on the navball

I also use FASA and it works work fine. Also I had another type of SpaceX mod installed and it did the same thing this one does. but this one handles it a bit better. could you test this out on your end?

 

I'm using the latest versoion of mechjeb and both expansions  I also have it set to use rescale. also KSP 1.91

Edited May 29, 2020 by cashaber
added version numbers

2 hours ago, cashaber said:

Also I had another type of SpaceX

Tundra Exploration?
I just looked on Ckan and it looks like there are two Tundra Exploration and Kerbalized SpaceX.
looks very nice, congrats on the release!! I will try it out as soon as Realism Overhaul support is introduced!
it was kerbalized Spacex

Hey! Nice mod! But i have a problem, the merlin 1D vacuum has low TWR. I've tried to change it myself, but i can't do this. It doens't matter if you modify the files, the power does not change. Another little visual issue is that the FH booster decoupler is white, instead of black (another thing that i could not modify). If you know any solution please make me know. Thanks

@Kartoffelkuchen I decided to land F9 Demo on a droneship, just for funzies

This took a lot of tries.

Also, has anyone else had problems with Falcon 9 stage 2 flipping after stage separation? Even if I set the SAS to prograde before separation, and activate RCS, it still wants to go backwards after I separate stage 1. Am I doing something wrong, or is this a bug?

Hello, really nice mod !!

I`m just having one problem, as soon as i try to launch the dragon crew, the trunk triggers and separates before i`m even able to do anything. Is there anything i can do to fix it?

Here is the list of mods i`m using. I`m on 1.9.1 by the way.

Hello ! Very same probelm here, looking forward if you have any solutions

Just as a fyi a log file would help out a lot. I will put the file path way for you the log file here  C:\Users\User\AppData\LocalLow\SQUAD\Kerbal Space Program. Other then that uninstall all other mods but this one and try it again there mite be mod that does not work good with this mod.

hi, thanks @Kartoffelkuchen for this great mod.

While trying do some orbit maneuvers with CrewDragon and trunk, and since the SuperDraco are now only used for launch escape. I attempted to use the "reversed" mode of the capsule and use the 4 monoprop thrusters around the docking port for higher deltaV maneuvers. But there are NO thrust-transforms in the model for these 4 thrusters... so they are not usable yet to realistically mock-up the real Crew Dragon dynamic.

Do you plan to add these 4 transforms to the model in a future update or patch?

Thanks
